descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new companion character - Gronak.
Gronak is an Orc Warrior who has taken to the Riverwood Inn and it\'s drink.

Gronak\'s stats are the same as Lydia\'s, so he is balanced.
He is marked as essential, so he will never die.
When you part ways, he will return to the Riverwood Inn.

This mod has been updated:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10887]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10887[/url]
author: Maddo3
